title: 你们认为哪个镐子挖东西最快？

replies.author: WarbleOrigin
replies.txt_content: 金工具的确比其他工具采掘速度更快

replies.author: zyjking
replies.txt_content: 我认为我的手是最快的233

replies.author: ade.tongnian
replies.txt_content: 万般皆下品，惟有附魔高！

replies.author: xx101
replies.txt_content: 水的好

replies.author: MC大湿
replies.txt_content: 粉色背景好评233

replies.author: 1351680343zxw
replies.txt_content:
呃呃呃
试试给钻石稿附上32767级的效率？

replies.author: milk_father
replies.txt_content: 这帖子水的厉害。。

replies.author: kg946
replies.txt_content: 创造最快

replies.author: dhkdwp
replies.txt_content: 本来就是金镐子最快

replies.author: ruhuasiyu
replies.txt_content:
kg946 发表于 2016-10-5 22:05
创造最快
you are too young!

In creative mode, blocks are destroyed in 0.05 second.

http://minecraft-zh.gamepedia.com/%E6%8C%96%E6%8E%98

replies.author: liach
replies.txt_content: 所有工具都能最快，只要绑定worldedit工具，左右键你要挖的方块，然后输入//set 0，就是最快的

replies.author: DDSKY
replies.txt_content: 附魔钻石镐哈哈哈哈哈

replies.author: DDSKY
replies.txt_content: 什么鬼啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊

replies.author: DDSKY
replies.txt_content:
好无聊啊
大号被禁言了谁帮我申请一下
531305897

replies.author: 幽儿~
replies.txt_content: 我认为TNT稿子最快 【某mod武器 】使用起来有着熊孩纸般的赶脚

replies.author: 莉莉霍瓦特
replies.txt_content: 当然是金稿子，因为钻石镐速度是9，金稿子是12（不附魔的情况下）

replies.author: 可能maybe
replies.txt_content:
很久前金稿子确实挖的最快
现在的版本是钻石镐挖的最快
再说谁会没事做金镐子
挖几下就爆了

replies.author: 咕哒染桑QwQ
replies.txt_content: 神之右手....

replies.author: pcktrsss
replies.txt_content: 效率V的金镐

replies.author: qq1823035886
replies.txt_content: 附魔金镐子

replies.author: lzs1234
replies.txt_content: 必须是金镐子，wiki上有

replies.author: H1HH3
replies.txt_content: 我认为是手最快。
